```{r}
#| include: false
# Create pdf and png version of template
library(tidyverse)
library(quarto)
library(magick)

# Render template
quarto_render(input = "index.qmd")
# Convert rendered PDF to PNG
image_read_pdf("_book/Awesome-thesis.pdf", pages = 1) |>
  image_montage(geometry = "x1000+25+35", tile = 1, bg = "grey92", shadow = TRUE) |>
  image_convert(format = "png") |>
  image_write("examples/cover.png", )
# Move pdf to examples folder
fs::file_copy("_book/Awesome-thesis.pdf", "examples/template.pdf", overwrite = TRUE)
```

# uOttawa (biology) Thesis Template

This is a Quarto template that assists you in creating a University of Ottawa thesis. You can fork or download the repository to get started but the recommended way is simply to use the quarto function within R or the system shell to install and use the template


``` r
quarto::quarto_use_template("juliengamartin/biouOthesis")
```

or in a terminal

``` bash
quarto use template("juliengamartin/biouOthesis")
```
